hanzi-su-wiki:
袋

Значения

Мешок, сумка

Мнемоника

Мешок с дырками для рук, рабам и крестьянам подчас заменявший 代 одежду 衣.

麻袋 [ má dài ]: sack; burlap bag

purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 代 [ dài ] era, generation; to substitute for, to replace
    • 衣 [ yī ] cloth; clothes, apparel; dress, coat
heisig_chinese_memo: A bag is an easy substitute for a real clothing.
koohiiStory1: A sack is an easy substitute for a garment.
koohiiStory2: A worker who was recently sacked from his job, is wearing a sack of potatoes as a substitute garment (naked otherwise), in some kind of protest. The kanji is close to frame 1547 "bag", and although the later really refers to a "straw sack", I use the image of a sack of potatoes here, and that of a "plastic bag" for frame 1547. The keywords would have been better swapped in my opinion, but the relevancy is not so important at this point (see notes of Lesson 31 in the book).
jp_example_words:
足袋(たび): Japanese socks (with split toe)
袋(ふくろ): bag, sack
手袋(てぶくろ): gloves
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You keep your substitute clothes in a sack. The clothes in the sack are just substitute clothes, so they only come out in emergencies.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Look at this sack of substitute clothes. Imagine it filled with all the clothes you hardly ever wear. What kind of clothes would be inside this sack?
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You need your substitute clothes so you take out your substitute clothes sack. You open it up to grab your substitute clothes, only to find out that there is a ton of salmon roe inside your sack. Oh man, you forgot all about putting that in there. You yell: F**K ROE (ふくろ) because that roe destroyed all your clothes and made it nasty.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine how nasty it is in there. Also imagine how smelly it is. Feel angry about putting roe in your sack. Why would you even do that? Why would the roe do this to you, as well.
Ru_Notes: Что необычно, используется также для слова お袋 [おふくろ] — [своя] мамаша.

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A bag is an easy substitute for a real clothing.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " clothing " to " generation ", the original meaning is an oral container made of soft and thin materials. "Yu Pian‧ Clothing Department": "Bag, bag also." " Bag " ancient work "帒", " Shu Wen Xin Attached": "帒, bag also. From the towel to the sound. Or from the clothes." "Sui Shu ‧Food and Merchandise": "A company tasted dried ginger and stored it in a cloth bag. It was often used as an injury expense and was heavily condemned."

" Bag " can be used as a quantifier in modern Chinese, such as a bag of apples and a few bags of books. "The Heroes of the Sons and Daughters" Chapter 4: "This son only went out after seeing him. Someone called him to stand under the eaves, snore several bags, and inhaled the cigarette from his mouth, but it came out from his nose. ."

" Bag " can also be used as a verb, meaning to put in a bag. Ming Feixin "Xingcha wins a glimpse of the thorn sa country": "No rain for several years, sinking winches, sheepskin bags of water."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " clothing ", " dai ", the original meaning is an oral container made of soft and thin materials.
humanum_full_description:
從「衣」，「代」聲，本義為用軟薄材料製成的有口盛器。《玉篇‧衣部》：「袋，囊也。」「袋」古作「帒」，《說文新附》：「帒，囊也。从巾代聲。或从衣。」《隋書‧食貨志》：「有司嘗進乾薑，以布袋貯之，常用為傷費，大加譴責。」

　　「袋」在近現代漢語中可用作量詞，如一袋蘋果，幾袋書。《兒女英雄傳》第4回：「這公子看他才出去，就有人叫住在房檐底下站着，呼嚕呼嚕的吸了好幾袋，把那煙從嘴裏吸進去，卻從鼻子裏噴出來。」

　　「袋」亦可用作動詞，表示裝入袋內。明費信《星槎勝覽‧刺撒國》：「數年無雨，鑿井絞車，羊皮袋水。」
humanum_short_description: 從「衣」，「代」聲，本義為用軟薄材料製成的有口盛器。

從「 衣 」，「 代 」聲，本義為用軟薄材料製成的有口盛器。《玉篇‧衣部》：「袋，囊也。」「 袋 」古作「 帒 」，《說文新附》：「帒，囊也。从巾代聲。或从衣。」《隋書‧食貨志》：「有司嘗進乾薑，以布袋貯之，常用為傷費，大加譴責。」 「 袋 」在近現代漢語中可用作量詞，如一袋蘋果，幾袋書。《兒女英雄傳》第4回：「這公子看他才出去，就有人叫住在房檐底下站着，呼嚕呼嚕的吸了好幾袋，把那煙從嘴裏吸進去，卻從鼻子裏噴出來。」 「 袋 」亦可用作動詞，表示裝入袋內。明費信《星槎勝覽‧刺撒國》：「數年無雨，鑿井絞車，羊皮袋水。」
From " clothing" to " generation", the original meaning is an oral container made of soft and thin materials. "Yu Pian‧ Clothing Department": "Bag, bag also." " Bag" ancient work " 帒", " Shu Wen Xin Attached": "帒, bag also. From the towel to the sound. Or from the clothes." "Sui Shu ‧Food and Merchandise": "A company tasted dried ginger and stored it in a cloth bag. It was often used as an injury expense and was heavily condemned." " Bag" can be used as a quantifier in modern Chinese, such as a bag of apples and a few bags of books. "The Heroes of the Sons and Daughters" Chapter 4: "This son only went out after seeing him. Someone called him to stand under the eaves, snore several bags, and inhaled the cigarette from his mouth, but it came out from his nose. ." " Bag" can also be used as a verb, meaning to put in a bag. Ming Feixin "Xingcha wins a glimpse of the thorn sa country": "No rain for several years, sinking winches, sheepskin bags of water."

袋字的基本解释

袋
dài
用布或皮做的盛东西的器物：袋子。布袋。衣袋。口袋。旅行袋。
量词，用于袋装的东西和水烟、旱烟：一袋儿面粉。一袋烟。

袋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dài］
［《廣韻》徒耐切，去代，定。］
(1)囊。用软薄材料制成的有口盛器。
(2)特指衣服上的口袋。
(3)装；放入口袋。
(4)量词。

袋字的英文翻译

◎ 袋
bag, sack

袋字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　袋； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1113第28
【唐韻】徒耐切【集韻】【韻會】待戴切【正韻】度耐切，?音代。【玉篇】囊屬。　【干祿字書】作帒。

袋字的源字形

袋字的起名意思

本义指有口的盛器，后也指衣袋，口袋等。

bag
Basic explanation of words
bag
dài
Utensils made of cloth or leather: bags. Cloth bag. Clothes pocket. pocket. Travel bag.
Quantifier, used for bagged things and hookah and dry tobacco: a bag of flour. A bag of cigarettes.
bag

[①]［dài］
["Guangyun" is only patiently cut, go to generation, set. ]
(1) The capsule. A mouthful made of soft and thin materials.
(2) Especially refers to the pockets on clothes.
(3) Install; put it in the pocket.
(4) Quantifiers.

Name meaning
The original meaning refers to a container with a mouth, and later also refers to pockets, pockets, etc.
衣 表馆 优
袋
形声字。巾表意,篆书形体像布中,表示袋用纺织品制成;代(dai)表声,代有代替义,表示口袋装物可代替人手提物。
隶、楷书形旁改为衣,表示衣服上有口袋。本义是口袋。
D口袋:布~「米~。②量词:一~米|两~糖。
~鼠 ~装 ~子 被~ 冰~ ロ~ 裤~ 面~

袋|
袋
楷
Музей стола одежды отлично
мешок
Пиктофонетические символы.
Полотенце представляет значение, форма надписи на печати похожа на ткань, что означает, что сумка сделана из текстиля; Dai (дай) представляет собой звук и имеет значение замены, что означает, что содержимое кармана может заменить человеческая рука.
Ли и обычный сценарий меняются на одежду, а это значит, что на одежде есть карманы.
Первоначальное значение - карман.
D карман: ткань ~ "м ~. ②Кантификатор: один ~ м | два ~ сахар.

мешок, торба; сумка; кошелёк (также счётное слово для сыпучих тел)
布袋 холщовый мешок

Radicals: 代, 衣  (substitute, clothes)
Meaning Mnemonic
You keep your substitute clothes in a sack. The clothes in the sack are just substitute clothes, so they only come out in emergencies.
Look at this sack of substitute clothes. Imagine it filled with all the clothes you hardly ever wear. What kind of clothes would be inside this sack?
Reading Mnemonic
You need your substitute clothes so you take out your substitute clothes sack. You open it up to grab your substitute clothes, only to find out that there is a ton of salmon roe inside your sack. Oh man, you forgot all about putting that in there. You yell: F**K ROE (ふくろ) because that roe destroyed all your clothes and made it nasty.
Imagine how nasty it is in there. Also imagine how smelly it is. Feel angry about putting roe in your sack. Why would you even do that? Why would the roe do this to you, as well.
